meanings.definition: A type of subatomic particle that is the antiparticle of a lepton.
meanings.sent1: Antileptons are tiny particles that have opposite properties to leptons.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study antileptons to understand their unique characteristics.
meanings.sent3: The antileptons decided to have a dance-off with the leptons for fun.
meanings.sent4: In the world of particles, antileptons are like the mirror image of leptons.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, antileptons appear as fascinating tiny entities.
